meanings.definition: A leaf with a single unbranched vein.
meanings.sent1: The tiny microphyll on the plant was easy to miss.
meanings.sent2: The botanist studied the microphyll under a microscope.
meanings.sent3: The microphyll waved in the breeze, looking like a miniature flag.
meanings.sent4: Her love for nature was as pure and simple as a microphyll.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green color of the microphyll stood out among the other leaves.
